com.galacticfiles
Class GFSession

java.lang.Object
  com.galacticfiles.GFSession

public class GFSession
extends java.lang.Object

A login session for an account. All access to galacticfiles must be done within the context of a session. A new valid session is created either when a new account is created, or after logging in with an existing account.

Constructor Detail

GFSession

public GFSession()
Method Detail

acceptTerms

public void acceptTerms(boolean t)
To create a new account you need to set this true. Any access to galacticfiles.com indicates you have accepted the terms regardless of setting this to true or not.

Please see: galacticfiles.com/terms.html

Parameters:
t - set to true to create new accounts

getToken

public java.lang.String getToken()
The login cookie for this session, or null if not logged in.

Returns:
the login cookie or null

createUser

public void createUser(java.lang.String userid,
                       java.lang.String password)
Create a new account. Note, acceptTerms must have been called with "true" before this will work.

WARNING: For a given IP address new accounts may only be created about every 5 minutes. Be sure to call check() after this to make sure your user id was successfully created.

Parameters:
userid - A new user id. It must not already exist.
password - A valid password. Passwords must contain at least one symbol, an upper case letter, and a number.
See Also:
AccountGenerator

login

public void login(java.lang.String userid,
                  java.lang.String password)
Login with an existing account

Parameters:
userid - The username of the account
password - The password for the account

check

public CheckData check()
Check the status of the current session.

Returns:
information about the account and session

listFiles

public java.util.List<FileInfo> listFiles()
List all the files this account has uploaded.

Returns:
list of files

deleteFile

public boolean deleteFile(java.lang.String fid)
Delete a file this account has uploaded. Files may still be availble from already generated download links for a while.

Parameters:
fid - The id of the file to delete
Returns:
true if successful

setPrivateFile

public boolean setPrivateFile(java.lang.String id)
Set a file to private mode. Only the owner and accounts granted access may generate download links.

Parameters:
id - The id of the file to set to private mode
Returns:
true if successfully updated

setPublicFile

public boolean setPublicFile(java.lang.String id)
Set a file to public mode. Any user will the file id will be able to generate download links and download the file.

Parameters:
id - The id of the file to set to public mode
Returns:
true if successfully updated

setDownloadpass

public boolean setDownloadpass(java.lang.String id,
                               java.lang.String pass)
Set the file download password. This puts the file in download password mode. Only users that know the download password will be able to generate download links and download the file.

Parameters:
id - The id of the file to set the download password for
pass - The donwload password
Returns:
true if successfully udpated

setFileFee

public boolean setFileFee(java.lang.String id,
                          java.lang.String fee)
Set the download link generation fee you would like to collect for a file. Once set this amount will be transfered from users' accounts that generate a download link to your account.

Parameters:
id - The id of the file to update the fee
fee - The new fee amount
Returns:
true if successfully updated

addFileGrant

public boolean addFileGrant(java.lang.String id,
                            java.lang.String userid)
Grant an account access to a private file. This has no effect on files that are not private.

Parameters:
id - The id of the file to grant the user access to
userid - The user to grant access to the file
Returns:
true if successfully granted access

deleteFileGrant

public boolean deleteFileGrant(java.lang.String id,
                               java.lang.String userid)
Remove a user's access to a private file. This has no effect on files that are not private.

Parameters:
id - The id of the file to remove the user's access
userid - The user to remove access from the file
Returns:
true if successfully removed the user's access

genAddress

public java.lang.String genAddress()
Generate a new bitcoin address the user can send funds to add to the account balance. New addresses can only be generated every 5 minutes.

Returns:
the bitcoin address or null if failed.

listAddresses

public java.util.List<AddressInfo> listAddresses()
List addresses generated for this account. Bitcoin sent to any of these addresses will add funds to the account.

Returns:
list of addresses

withdraw

public boolean withdraw(java.lang.String addr,
                        java.lang.String amnt)
Send bitcoin from the account to a bitcoin address. Funds are immediately removed from the account balance.

NOTE: The site's withdraw fee is subtracted from the amount transfered. If you specify an amount of 0.0004. The transfered amount will be 0.0004 - withdrawfee (0.0002), and 0.0004 will be deducted from the account balance.

Parameters:
addr - The address to send funds to
amnt - The amount to send from the account
Returns:
true if successful

listDeposits

public java.util.List<DepositInfo> listDeposits()
List all transactions sent to payment addresses generated for this account. Not all may be confirmed and added to the balance.

Returns:
list of deposits

listWithdraws

public java.util.List<WithdrawInfo> listWithdraws()
List all transactions sent from this account.

Returns:
list of withdraws

genDownloadLink

public DownloadLink genDownloadLink(java.lang.String fileid,
                                    java.lang.String pass,
                                    java.lang.String ip)
Generate a download link for a file. This file does not need to be owned by this account, but if it is private this account must have been granted access. If the file has a download password it must be specified correctly. The download link can be generated for any IP address. Invalid ip addresses or attempts to mask will cause the IP to be replaced by this connection's ip address.

Parameters:
fileid - The id of the file to generate a download link for
pass - The download password or null if there is not one
ip - The IP address that can download the file or null to use this connection's.
Returns:
the download link created or the fee if failed due to insufficient funds

listDownloadLinks

public java.util.List<DownloadLink> listDownloadLinks()
List all still valid download links generated by this account.

Returns:
list of download links that have not expired

uploadFile

public java.lang.Long uploadFile(java.io.File f,
                                 boolean pub,
                                 java.lang.String fee)
Upload a new public or private file with the fee specified. This will block until the whole file has been uploaded or there is a failure.

Parameters:
f - The file to upload
pub - True if the file should be public
fee - The fee you want to charge for download links
Returns:
The id of the file or null if upload failed

uploadFile

public java.lang.Long uploadFile(java.io.File f,
                                 java.lang.String dlpass,
                                 java.lang.String fee)
Upload a new file with a download password. This will block until the whole file has been uploaded or there is a failure.

Parameters:
f - The file to upload
dlpass - The password needed to generate new download links
fee - The fee you want to charge for download links
Returns:
The id of the file or null if upload failed
